So I was thinking about capture clauses and I wound up writing a whole RFC draft:

https://hackmd.io/38jKhUkvSC2pkG1BrI3boQ?edit

@WG-rfc-2229 :point_up:
I don't think it would be too hard to implement, but it's also maybe a bit out of the scope you signed up for :)
@nikomatsakis thank you for writting this up, we'll take a look over the weekend and I'll let you know how our discussion goes
Implementation wise, I think we only need a small subset for the purposes of RFC 2229, and we could start there
Implementation wise, I feel we can get away without even needing a desugaring
We can just deal with them the same way we deal with old style capture analysis i.e. force capture
I read the RFC a bit, and left some comments, I plan on doing a better review tonight
